name: Instagram Reimagined
description: Media Archaeology motivates us to investigate media from obsolescence to new when thinking about the meanings of what technology we should have for human interactions. Instagram Reimagined prompts questions about whether the classical and modern Instagram apps can be easy to view and navigate on bigger screens such as iPads and Macs, through basic interactions and customizable features. Not all users today consider a pure browsing and photography experience in Instagram. The work presented here incorporates multiple personalized modes to create an entirely new experience for iPhones, iPads, and Macs, reimagining alternative features for the future while maintaining and drawing upon the classic Instagram interface.‚Äù
